bug.author: QiJune
bug.summary: build release version of release/0.11.0 failed on Mac
bug.description:
The cmake config is: <denchmark-code>cmake .. -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DWITH_GOLANG=OFF -DPYTHON_EXECUTABLE=/usr/local/bin/python2.7 -DPYTHON_LIBRARY=/usr/local/Cellar/python/2.7.14/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/2.7/lib/libpython2.7.dylib </denchmark-code>
The log is following: <denchmark-code>[ 15%] Built target paddle_proto paddle/framework/CMakeFiles/framework_py_proto.dir/build.make:60: *** target pattern contains no `%'. Stop. make[1]: *** [paddle/framework/CMakeFiles/framework_py_proto.dir/all] Error 2 make[1]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs.... [ 15%] Linking CXX static library libddim.a cpplint: Checking source code style [ 15%] Linking CXX static library libframework_proto.a </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: Please use make framework_py_proto to get the complete error log.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/reyoung>@reyoung</denchmark-link> The log is following: <denchmark-code>âžœ build git:(release/0.11.0) make framework_py_proto Built target framework_py_proto_init paddle/framework/CMakeFiles/framework_py_proto.dir/build.make:60: *** target pattern contains no `%'. Stop. make[2]: *** [paddle/framework/CMakeFiles/framework_py_proto.dir/all] Error 2 make[1]: *** [paddle/framework/CMakeFiles/framework_py_proto.dir/rule] Error 2 make: *** [framework_py_proto] Error 2 </denchmark-code>
Interesting. Maybe you need use a local protobuf, not build protobuf by Paddle

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/reyoung>@reyoung</denchmark-link>
After I install protobuf, the build is successful. <denchmark-code>brew install protobuf </denchmark-code>

tried brew install protobuf, not working in my case, same error <denchmark-code>Scanning dependencies of target framework_py_proto_init [ 56%] Built target framework_py_proto_init paddle/framework/CMakeFiles/framework_py_proto.dir/build.make:60: *** target pattern contains no `%'. Stop. make[1]: *** [paddle/framework/CMakeFiles/framework_py_proto.dir/all] Error 2 make: *** [all] Error 2 </denchmark-code>
found the root cause of this issue, if you are building in Mac, make sure your cmake is later than 3.4 or it will throw this error.
I'm building in Mac with cmake 3.11 and throw the same error
